title: Sirikkadhey Lyrics Remo Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Remo Sirikkadhey Song Lyrics
Singers : Arjun Kanungo and Srinidhi Venkatesh
Music: Anirudh
Lyrics : Vignesh Shivan

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Un peyaril en peyarai serthu
Viralodu uyir kooda korthu
Oor munne ondraaga naamum
Nadandhaal enna!

Yen nenjin theeye
Ull engum neeye
Kanmoodum podhum
Kanmun nindraaye

Sirikaadhey Sirikaadhey
Siripaale mayakaadhey
Adikaadhey adikaadhey
Azhagaale adikaadhey

Nenaika theriyaadha
Adai mazhaiye
Nanaiya theriyaadha
Malar kudaiye

Maraiya theriyaadha
Pagal nilave
Yennai theriyaadhaa
Pen azhage!

Nenaika theriyaadha
Adai mazhaiye
Nanaiya theriyaadha
Malar kudaiye

Maraiya theriyaadha
Pagal nilave
Yennai theriyaadhaaa …..

Un peyaril en peyarai serthu
Viralodu uyir kooda korthu
Oor munne ondraaga naamum
Nadandhaal enna!

Manam vittu unmai mattum
Unnodu pesida vendum
Nee ketkum kaadhalai allí
Unmel naan poosida vendum

Naan kaanum ottrai kanavai
Un kaadhil olirada vendum
Yenai meeri unnidam mayangum
Ennai naan thaduthida ...

Koodaathey koodathey
Innnal mudiya koodathey
Pogaathey pogaathey
Yenai nee thaandi pogathey

Nerungaathey nerungaathey
Yen penmai thaangaathey
Thirakaadhey thirakaadhey
Yen manadhai thirakaadhey

Nenaika theriyaadha
Adaimazhaiye
Nenaya theriyaadha
Malar kudaiye

Maraya theriyaadha
Pagal nilave
Yennai theriyaadhaa
Pen azhage!

Nenaika theriyaadha
Adaimazhaiye
Nenaya theriyaadha
Malar kudaiye

Maraya theriyaadha
Pagal nilave
Yennai theriyaadhaa…

Un peyaril en peyarai serthu
Viralodu uyir kooda korthu
Oor munne ondraaga naamum
Nadandhaal enna!

English Meaning
I tried my best :)
Why don’t we walk
In front of all people
joining my name with yours
n holding our soul in hands

You’re my heart's fire
You’re in me everywhere
While I close my eyes
You always stand before me

Don’t smile don’t smile
Don’t deceive by smiling
Don’t hit me don’t hit me
Don’t hit with ur beauty

Don’t you know to wet,
The continuous rain.
Don’t you know to get wet,
A flower umbrella

Don’t you know to hide,
The daylight moon.
Don’t you know me ,
Beautiful lady.

Don’t you know to wet,
continuous rain.
Don’t you know to get wet,
A flower umbrella

Don’t you know to hide,
The daylight moon.
Don’t you know me ...

Why don’t we walk
In front of all people
joining my name with yours
n holding our soul in hands

I want to be candid
with you.
I want to smear all the
love you want on you

I want to blabber
my first dream about you.
To stop myself from me
In getting into you…

Shouldn’t go, shouldn’t go
This day shouldn’t go
Don’t go don't go
Don't go away from me

Don’t get closer to me
My femininity can’t hold up.
Don’t open , don’t open
Don’t open my mind.

Don’t you know to wet,
The continuous rain.
Don’t you know to get wet,
A flower umbrella

Don’t you know to hide,
The daylight moon.
Don’t you know me ,
Beautiful lady.

Don’t you know to wet,
continuous rain.
Don’t you know to get wet,
A flower umbrella

Don’t you know to hide,
The daylight moon.
Don’t you know me ...

Why don’t we walk
In front of all people
joining my name with yours
n holding our soul in hands
